title: SCP-PL-150
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:betterfootnotes]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block-peppo name=http://scp-pl.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-pl-150/bucior.png|caption=Contained instance of SCP-PL-150.]]
**Item #:** SCP-PL-150

**Object Class:** Maksur[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]Item has been separated into several anomalous parts which must be kept separate.[[/span]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** Instances of SCP-PL-150 are to be contained within Type IV Safe Class Lockers, each being secured in separate facilities located at least 100 kilometers from one another.[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]Currently Site-PL-03, Site-PL-154, Area-PL-07 and Area-PL-12.[[/span]]

Every week, a low-level member of the Antimemetics Division is to be authorized usage of the Gh/6-17 mnestic terminal at Site-PL-03 to initiate Procedure PL-150-Lāmedh. All recovered information about SCP-PL-150 during Procedure PL-150-Lāmedh are to be transcribed and sent immediately to Site-PL-03's management, which will forward it to Antimemetics Division leadership following completion of the Procedure.

Personnel assigned to Procedure PL-150-Lāmedh are aware of its process and possible health consequences.

**Description: ##red|__[ERROR, NO INFORMATION IMPLEMENTED]__##**
